description.value:
Upon reaching 6th level, you can create explosive bursts of elemental energies to buffet your foes. As an action, you can spend 1 ki to create an area of dangerous elemental energy. You will the elements to impose your foes how you desire, choose between the option to Buffet your foes with hampering effects or to Burst them with harmful damaging bursts. Then choose how you wish to Mold Elements against your foes to craft the area of effect, which originates from you.

  • Buffet. Your training with the elements allow you to focus the elements in ways that bend your enemies' wills to yours. Choose between Imprison, Pummel, and Rumble for the desired effect.

    • Imprison. Creatures must succeed a Dexterity saving throw or become Restrained until the end of your next turn.
    • Pummel. Creatures must succeed a Constitution saving throw or become Dazed until the end of your next turn.

    • Rumble. Creatures must succeed a Strength saving throw or be knocked Prone.

  • Burst. Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, magical bludgeoning, magical piercing or magical slashing damage. Creatures must succeed a Dexterity saving throw or take a number of Martial Arts die equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1) of your chosen damage type, or half as much damage on a successful save.

Mold Elements. You choose the shape and size of the area affected by the energies you release. You can choose the area to be a 15-foot cone, a 5-foot radius, or a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. The area and size can be increased once you reach certain levels in monk. At 11th level in monk you can choose to create a 30-foot cone, a 10-foot radius, or a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide for 1 additional Ki Point. At 17th level in monk you can choose to create a 60-foot cone, a 20-foot radius, or a line 120 ft long and 15 feet wide for 1 more additional Ki Point.
